subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Absent from the playoffs the last 15 seasons, the Orioles continued their miracle season Friday night, edging the Rangers, 5-1, behind Joe Saunders and three relievers.
snippet: Absent from the playoffs the last 15 seasons, the Orioles continued their miracle season Friday night, edging the Rangers, 5-1, behind Joe Saunders and three relievers.
